Model
Class ModelInterface

java.lang.Object
  Model.ModelInterface

public class ModelInterface
extends java.lang.Object

The class acts as an interface to the View and the Controller. It communicates with classes within the Model package to execute out Preprocessing Flow and BLAST processing Flow.

Method Detail

getPreviewLines

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPreviewLines()
The method reads the first 20 lines of the specified file and returns a list of first 20 lines of that file. If a paired end file exists, the first 20 lines of the paired end file will also be read and added to the list.

Returns:
shortreads - is a list containing 20 lines of shortreads
Throws:
java.io.IOException - An exception if the file can not be read.

public void readInputFile()

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException

generateInputFASTAFile

public void generateInputFASTAFile()
                            throws java.io.IOException
The function generates a tag file and input fasta file for an input file selected for BLASTing purposes. 5 temp files are initially created, which stores inputLines with the ID A, G, C, T and N respectively. Then the file is read once, and each line is stored in a its respective temp file. After the file is read, covertFiletoHT() function is called to convert a temp file into a hashtable of shortreads. Lines with the same ID and region are only stores once in the hashtable and a count of it is recorded Then the hashtable is written to a file called tag file. All inputLines are written to inputFasta file. This process is repeated for all hashtables

Throws:
java.io.IOException

covertFiletoHT

public java.util.Hashtable covertFiletoHT(java.io.FileInputStream fis,
                                          int numberOfSR)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
